page.title: 07DALGETY SPILLERS,MORETON
page.content: Dalgety Spillers is a worldwide firm with a branch on the site of the old Moreton Windmill.They deal with crops and grain. 50 people work there, including drivers,office workers,computer operators, and people who work in the laboratory where they test the grain suitability for flour.The grain treatment is so automated that only 3 men work in this section. The grain Dalgety sells for seed or animal feed is tested to the highest standard.They sell horse and pony cubes, chicken and rabbit pellets, rolled barley,crushed oats, and many other feeds. In Epping Museum there is a model of the wind mill which stood where the buildings now stand. Dalgety Mill,if sold, would be worth 2 million pounds.
